channel.title: Delta, 317 moddeling help! rep++
channel.description:
Hello everyone, I got a big problem.
Everytime i try to add a model to my 317 delta client it fails. If i spawn the item my client freeze.
I will show you how i add a model.
I download the model, I place it in a Gzip and it comes out as a winrar file. Inside it is the .dat file.
I place the model into my model folders. All .dat files there witch windows cannot open. Then i go into the client and i type add model 8000 (The model name in the model folder) it says : model added succesfully!
After that i open class8.java and add this int :
[code]if(i == 15272) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];//menu class8.aStringArray189[0] = "Eat"; class8.anInt174 = 8000 ;//inventory/drop model class8.anInt181 = 1460;//Model Zoom class8.anInt190 = 499 ;//rotation 1 class8.anInt198 = 1926;//rotation 2 class8.anInt169 = 3;//model offset 1 class8.anInt194 = 0;//model offset 2 class8.aString170 = "Rocktail";//name class8.aByteArray178 = "Some nicely cooked rocktail.".getBytes();//name }[/code]
after that i make the code look like this or else i get a error becaus all my model codes are like that :
[code]case 15272: class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];//menu class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Eat"; class8.anInt174 = 8000 ;//inventory/drop model class8.anInt181 = 1460;//Model Zoom class8.anInt190 = 499 ;//rotation 1 class8.anInt198 = 1926;//rotation 2 class8.anInt169 = 3;//model offset 1 class8.anInt194 = 0;//model offset 2 class8.aString170 = "Rocktail";//name class8.aByteArray178 = "Some nicely cooked rocktail.".getBytes();//name break;[/code]
I safe it. Compile. Start client again and pickup it. Freeze :/ I tried this with other models to, Same story :/
What am i doing wrong?
Hope someone can help me. Youridudock

@youridudock wrote:

[quote=“Mod-Vlad-, post:2, topic:402284”]Yea, I meet same problem!
But post a code comes out in cmd console.[/quote]

item.title: Delta, 317 moddeling help! rep++
item.dc:creator: @youridudock youridudock
item.description:
@youridudock wrote:

Hello everyone, I got a big problem.

Everytime i try to add a model to my 317 delta client it fails. If i spawn the item my client freeze.

I will show you how i add a model.

I download the model, I place it in a Gzip and it comes out as a winrar file. Inside it is the .dat file.

I place the model into my model folders. All .dat files there witch windows cannot open. Then i go into the client and i type add model 8000 (The model name in the model folder)
it says : model added succesfully!

After that i open class8.java and add this int :

if(i == 15272) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];//menu class8.aStringArray189[0] = "Eat"; class8.anInt174 = 8000 ;//inventory/drop model class8.anInt181 = 1460;//Model Zoom class8.anInt190 = 499 ;//rotation 1 class8.anInt198 = 1926;//rotation 2 class8.anInt169 = 3;//model offset 1 class8.anInt194 = 0;//model offset 2 class8.aString170 = "Rocktail";//name class8.aByteArray178 = "Some nicely cooked rocktail.".getBytes();//name }

after that i make the code look like this or else i get a error becaus all my model codes are like that :

case 15272: class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];//menu class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Eat"; class8.anInt174 = 8000 ;//inventory/drop model class8.anInt181 = 1460;//Model Zoom class8.anInt190 = 499 ;//rotation 1 class8.anInt198 = 1926;//rotation 2 class8.anInt169 = 3;//model offset 1 class8.anInt194 = 0;//model offset 2 class8.aString170 = "Rocktail";//name class8.aByteArray178 = "Some nicely cooked rocktail.".getBytes();//name break;

I safe it. Compile. Start client again and pickup it. Freeze I tried this with other models to, Same story

What am i doing wrong?

Hope someone can help me.
Youridudock

Read full topic
